description:
Through videos and quizzes, on this negotiation and negotiating skills course you will discover…

Understanding Negotiation

  • The Three Phases
  • Skills for Successful Negotiating

Getting Prepared

  • Establishing Your WATNA and BATNA
  • Identifying Your WAP
  • Identifying Your ZOPA

Laying the Groundwork

  • Establishing Common Ground
  • Creating a Negotiation Framework
  • The Negotiation Process

Phase One — Exchanging Information

  • Getting off on the Right Foot
  • What to Share
  • What to Keep to Yourself

Bargaining

  • What to Expect
  • Techniques to Try
  • How to Break an Impasse

About Mutual Gain

  • Three Ways to See Your Options
  • About Mutual Gain
  • What Do I Want?
  • What Do They Want?
  • What Do We Want?

Phase Three — Closing

  • Reaching Consensus
  • Building an Agreement
  • Setting the Terms of the Agreement

Dealing with Difficult Issues

  • Dealing with Personal Attacks
  • Controlling Your Emotions
  • Deciding When It’s Time to Walk Away

This video course is the same course content that we deliver in our classroom negotiation skills course.
title: Negotiation Skills: Discover How To Negotiate In 1 Day
